sourcesContent: SN Sent Date Year of Payment Nett Payment Arrear Payment Refund Total Amount Declared Manual Adjustment {{ i + 1 }} {{ record.sentDate }} {{ record.yearOfPayment }} {{ record.nettPayment }} {{ record.arrearPayment }} {{ record.refund }} {{ record.totalAmountDeclared }} {{ record.manualAdjustment }} import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'n2-nsman-tax-tab', templateUrl: './nsman-tax-tab.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nsman-tax-tab.component.scss'] }) export class NsmanTaxTabComponent implements OnInit { sampleData = [ { sentDate: "10-10-2021 (1800)", yearOfPayment: "2020", nettPayment: "1,000.00", arrearPayment: "500.00 (2019)", refund: "-200.00 (2019)", totalAmountDeclared: "1,700.00", manualAdjustment: "Yes" }, { sentDate: "10-09-2020 (1800)", yearOfPayment: "2019", nettPayment: "1,700.00", arrearPayment: "300.00 (2018)", refund: "-200.00 (2018)", totalAmountDeclared: "1,800.00", manualAdjustment: "No" }, { sentDate: "10-08-2019 (1800)", yearOfPayment: "2018", nettPayment: "1,700.00", arrearPayment: "700.00 (2017)", refund: "-200.00 (2017)", totalAmountDeclared: "2,200.00", manualAdjustment: "No" }, ] constructor() { // to do } ngOnInit(): void { // to do } exportCSV(): void { // to do } }
